name: Eclipse (RozanBR)
description:
Eclipse is a platformer game made for the Community Game Jam!

You play as a hero who needs to gather all Orbs to seal the Darkness away once again, or is it?

You need to collect Orbs by exchange them with the "Nightbringers". They all follow the same rules when it comes to exchanging the items.

The game has platforming elements, a basic puzzle and a boss battle.

Every element of the game has been made from scratch as per Game Jam's rules.

Thanks for playing my Community Game Jam entry!
